entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Trois-Rivières
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Trois-Rivières Airport 11:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight then changing to freezing rain overnight. Snow over northern sections. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:01 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain near noon. Snow over northern sections in the morning. Local snowfall amount 10 cm over northern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:01 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches overnight. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:01 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
